sprykerComponent.name: toggle-select-form
sprykerComponent.readme:
toggle-select-form (molecule)

Represents toggle-class for the specified DOM-elements on the target change event.

Code sample

{% include molecule('toggle-select-form', 'CartToShoppingListWidget') with {
    data: {
        attribute: attribute,
        selectAttributes: {
            'data-select-trigger': 'data-select-trigger',
            'target': 'target',
            'class-to-toggle': 'class-to-toggle'
        }
    }
} only %}

methods.name: mapEvents
methods.description: Makes the trigger element a listener of the change event.

methods.name: onTriggerClick
methods.description: Disables the default behavior of the change event and invokes the toggle method.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Adds or removes class names from the target elements.
